승인대기 문서 홈: Display a list of 5 Documents waiting for Apporval.
등록대기 문서 홈: Display a list of 5 Documents waiting for Register.
문서삭제확인: Would you like to delete the Document?
문서삭제설명: All versions of the selected document will be deleted. Once document is deleted, it cannot be restored.
문서등록확인: Would you like to register the Document?
문서등록확인설명:
Version is added after registering the document.
Accoring to the documentbox, document is registered after administrator's approval.
일괄승인확인: Would you like to approve Documents in bulk?
승인확인: Would you like to approve registering the Document?
문서수정확인: Would you like to edit the Document?
문서수정확인설명:
If you edit the document waiting for approval
administrator cannot see this document.
문서함선택해주세요: Please select the location to register Document.
{{arg0}} must be more than {{arg1}} characters, and less than {{arg2}} characters.
다른문서함선택알림: Please select a document box which is different with current document box.
There is no document box available to register a document.
승인문서함이동설명: Only the administrator of the selected document box can move a document to the selected document box.
이 문서를 삭제하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to delete this document?
현재 버전의 문서만 삭제하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to delete only the current version of this document?
